attributes.action: reaquire HMS Hermes upon her decommisioning from the Indian navy to create a fitting memorial and museum to those who fought in the Falklands conflict.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that there should be a permanent memorial to the events of the Falklands campaign so that the achievements of the task force and British armed services are never forgotten.To this end there could be no better memorial than the task force flagship,(soon to be decommisiond by the Indian navy), with exhibits of various aircraft types from that conflict in much the same way as the US has turned some of its WW2 carriers into museums so that that conflct is memorialised.
